price: Na εberε a wͻn werε frii (afutuo) a yεde tuu wͻn no, Ye’buee (anigyedeε) biara ho pono (kwan) maa wͻn, kosii εberε a wͻn wͻ anigyeε mu wͻ deε yεde ama wͻn no mu no, Yε’sͻͻ wͻn mu mpofire mu, na hwε, wͻ’nuu wͻn ho dii awerεhoͻ.
arabic: فَلَمَّا نَسُواْ مَا ذُكِّرُواْ بِهِۦ فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَبۡوَٰبَ كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَرِحُواْ بِمَآ أُوتُوٓاْ أَخَذۡنَٰهُم بَغۡتَةٗ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبۡلِسُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falammā nasū mā dhukkirū bihi fataḥnā ʿalayhim abwāba kulli shayin ḥattā idhā fariḥū bimā ūtū akhadhnāhum baghtatan fa-idhā hum mub'lisūna
